# coralogix_integration (Data Source)

A Coralogix Integration

## Example Usage

```hcl
data "coralogix_integration" "test" {
  id = coralogix_integration.test.id
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) Integration ID.

- `integration_key` (String) Selector for the integration.
